captions.text: [music]

>> Joe: Hey guys welcome to SourceFed, I’m
Joe Bereta

>> Elliott: I’m Elliott Morgan and we’re
about to pull back the curtain. Ask any YouTuber

how much they make and you’re bound to be
met with an evasive laugh and a “Well, that’s
a personal question.”

>> Joe: So that’s why we’re about to tell
you exactly how much we… read that other
YouTubers make.

>> Elliott: Business Insider compiled a list
of the top 20 YouTube Stars by how much green

they take home as listed by the analytics
company Social Blade. You’ll notice that

the ranges on this are absolutely absurd,
but that’s because the amount a YouTuber

can make from a video changes based on the
CPMs their videos earn. What’s a CPM?
>> Joe: Glad you asked Elliott

>> Elliott: Why are you in black and white,
Joe?
>> Joe: Call me Mr. YouTube Money Science

>> Elliott: There’s gotta be a catchier
name for this character.

>> Joe: Watch your tone, Billy. You see CPMs
is the term for cost per every thousand impressions

or “views” and it can range from the low
rate of .60 cents per thousand impressions
all the way up to $5 per thousand impressions.

>> Elliott: Wow! Thanks Mr. YouTube Money
Science

>> Joe: Sure thing, Billy. Call me Mr. Explanation.
It’s also important to note that all of

these figures you’re about to hear come
after YouTube takes their 45% cut, because

I mean, a guy’s gotta live, right? Even
big companies need a return on investment.
>> Elliott: Shall we move on?

>> Joe: We shall! Number 20 is seven year
old EvanTubeHD who reviews toys and video

games and brings in anywhere from 134,000
– 1.32 million dollars a month. That’s
a lot of toys and video games.

>> Elliott: 19. TheRadBrad brings in anywhere
from 137,000 – 1.38 Million for his video
game walk throughs

>> Joe: Jumping ahead a bit you’ll find
Captain Sparklez at number 16 making 174 thousand
to 1.76 million a year.

>> Elliott: The Spanish speaking HolaSoyGerman
ranks number 12 with upwards of 210,000 dollars
a year reaching as high as 2.11 million.

>> Joe: Toby Turner is number 10 with his
gaming, vlog, and main channels collectively

earning him an estimated 226,000 to 2.18 million
dollars a year.

>> Elliott: Pranksters PrankvsPrank are at
number 9 with their 7.7 million subscribers

earning the couple 223 thousand dollars to
2.26 million dollars a year.

>> Joe: Number 7 is the Fine Brothers who’s
react series allegedly bring in 239,000 thousand

to 2.41 million dollars annually. That means
per year.

>> Elliott: Smosh comes in at number four
pulling anywhere from 448 thousand to 4.5

million a year, but there’s two of them
so, like, math. You know?

>> Joe: Three and Two are both surprises to
us as they’re DisneyCollectorBR and BluCollection

who each can make up to 6.38 million dollars
a year just by opening and assembling toys.
Believe it or not.
>> Elliott: And number one of course is
>> Joe: PewDiePie

>> Elliott: PewDiePie who can make anywhere
from 825 thousand to 8.47 million dollars
a year.
>> Joe: Those are the numbers so stop asking.

>> Elliott: Which of these people on the list
was most surprising to you? Let us know in

the comments down below. Don’t forget to
like this video, subscribe to the channel

and click this annotation for everything we’ve
ever done. I’m Elliott Morgan.

>> Joe: I’m Joe Bereta. Too bad this list
wasn’t handsomest YouTubers, because I think
we know who’d take number one and two.
>> Elliott: Oh yeah.
[music]
